trans-unit.source: Represents a column header for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
A GridViewColumnHeader object is a button control that is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
GridViewColumnHeader properties keep track of mouse events and the resizing of columns.
Column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode are GridViewColumnHeader objects.
You can customize GridViewColumnHeader objects by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A GridViewColumnHeader is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A> dependency property.
To be added.
Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> is pressed.
The event arguments.
Responds to the creation of the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and updates the floating version of the header when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
This implementation does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event when a column is changing its position.
Provides an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> implementation of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> clears mouse capture.
This implementation does not change the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.
The event data.

Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref> event when the user pauses the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and its column to a new location in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> by using the mouse.
To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> event when the mouse moves off the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> with the mouse from its old location, to move the header and its column.
To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
The event data.

Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
This method captures the mouse and sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
The event data.

Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event when the user releases the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event (which occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`).
It also ends the mouse capture that was set by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method.
This provides a way for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
The event data.

Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event that occurs when the user moves the mouse within a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
This implementation keeps the left mouse button in a pressed state while a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> is moved by a drag-and-drop operation.

This also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> to remain set to `true` when the mouse with its left mouse button pressed moves off the header.

This implementation keeps the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
The event data.
Responds to a change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> dimensions.
Information about the change in the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
Gets the role of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> class performs layout for the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and places an additional column header at the end to add space.
A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies this column header in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies a column that is currently the object of a drag-and-drop operation.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the current role of the column.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> dependency property.
To be added.
Determines whether to serialize a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

This method applies to the following dependency properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty>
The dependency property.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> must be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
